}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Features=== *Embedded ARM (Cortex-R4) processor for full host CPU offload :Embedded 32-bit RISC microprocessor (+ MT7915DAN) *Highly integrated RF with 40nm low power process :Integrate high efficiency internal 4G/5G PAs *4T4R with support of up to 2402 Mbps PHY rate :Supports 4×4:4SS 11ax Wave2 MU-MIMO :Configurable 4×4/3×3 or 2×2n + 2×2ax DBDC *MU-MIMO configurations of: 4 users: 4×1ss; :3 users: 2×1ss + 1×2ss or 3×1ss :2 users: 2×2ss or 1×1ss + 1×2ss or 2×1ss *Supports 5, 10, 20, 40, 80, 80+80 channels :Suppport MU-OFDMA TX/RX, STBC, LDPC :Support TX Beamformer and RX Beamformee :Greenfield, mixed mode, legacy modes support *WFA WMM, WMM PS (QoS), Intelligent power saving *Intelligent Calibration (iCal) reduces the production time *WoWLAN via GPIO (client mode), supports Host Sleep (AP mode) *Noise mitigation: Supports spectrum analysis for non-Wi-Fi signals :Supports background scan function for fast channel switching
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AsiaRF AW7915-NP1 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:AsiaRF AW7915-NP1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]

*[[AsiaRF AW7916-AED]] • AX3000 Wi-Fi 6E 2T2R/3T3R 11ax A/E Key M.2 Module • MT7916AN *[[AsiaRF AW7915-AE1]] • AX2400 Wi-Fi 6 4T4R 11ax A/E Key M.2 Module • MT7915AN • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-6-11ax-m-2-ae-key-mt7915-aw7915-ae1/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF AW7915-AED]] • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 2T2R 11ax A/E Key M.2 Module • MT7915DAN • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-6-11ax-m-2-ae-key-module-2-mt7915-aw7915-aed/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF AW7915-BMD]] • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 2T2R 11ax B/M Key M.2 Module • MT7915DAN • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-6-11ax-m-2-bm-key-module-mt7915-aw7915-bmd/ PPage] *[[AsiaRF AW7615-NP1]] - AC1700 WiFi 5 4T4R DBDC Mini PCIe Module (11ac 1.7Gbps) • MT7615 :FCC ID: TKZAW7615NP1 (2021-11-09) • AC1700 WiFi 5 11ac 4T4R module (1700Mbps) <!-- *[[AsiaRF AWM13P]](-001) - WiFi High Power 11ac Mini PCIe Half Card Module • MT7613E *[[AsiaRF AW2405-AC1]](X) - WiFi AC600 Dual-Band High Power USB Adapter • MT7612U :FCC ID: TKZAW2405AC1X (2021-10-07) • WiFi USB Outdoor Dongle :FCC ID: TKZAW2405AC1 (2018-04-03) • WiFi USB Dongle *[[AsiaRF WS3294]] - WiFi 4T4R 11ac Mini PCIe Module (1.7Gbps) • MT7615 *[[AsiaRF WS2433]] - WiFi 11ac Mini PCIe Module (2.4/5GHz) • MT7612E *[[AsiaRF WS2433-H]] - WiFi High Power Mini PCIe Module (1W 802.11ac 5GHz) • MT7612E *[[AsiaRF MT7612-G01]] - WiFi High Power Mini PCIe Module (11ac 2.4GHz) • MT7612E
*[[AsiaRF AP7621-NV1]] - WiFi Router Board 3 Giga Ethernets 3 mini PCIe • MT7621 *[[AsiaRF AP7621-001]] - WiFi Router Board 2 Giga Ethernets 3 mini PCIe • MT7621 *[[AsiaRF CCPE001]] - WiFi LTE 5G CPE Ceiling (1.7Gbps) GPS • MT7621A/MT7615 --><!-- ===FCC ID=== *TKZAW7916-NPD (2023-11-10) WiFi 6E Mini PCIe Module *TKZMM610X-001 (2023-07-25) Wi-Fi HaLow Module *TKZAW7915-NPD (2022-07-13) WiFi 6 11ax 4T4R Module *TKZAP7632EC1 (2022-03-13) 11ac WiFi Router (MT7620A/MT7612E) *TKZAW7915NP1 (2021-11-12) WiFi 6 11ax 4T4R Module (2400Mbps) *TKZAW7615NP1 (2021-11-09) WiFi 5 11ac 4T4R Module (1700Mbps) *TKZAW2405AC1X (2021-10-07) WiFi USB Outdoor Dongle *TKZAWV03SR3 (2020-11-17) WiFi Router *TKZAWM688 (2020-07-29) WiFi AP Router Module *TKZAWV03S-003 (2020-04-14) WiFi Router *TKZAWV03S-ATA (2019-10-17) WiFi Router *TKZAP7628-NN1 (2019-08-23) WiFi Router *TKZAP7628-NU1 (2019-08-07) WiFi Router *TKZAW2405AC1 (2018-04-03) WiFi USB Dongle *TKZAWM003 (2017-11-11) WiFi AP Router Module *TKZAWV03S (2016-09-23) Wireless VoIP Router *TKZAWUHN2487 (2013-12-06) WiFi USB Dongle VERSA3 *TKZAWUHN2405-2 (2013-06-21) WiFi USB Dongle *TKZAWM002 (2013-04-26) WiFi AP Router Module *TKZAWAPN2403 (2013-04-23) WiFi Router *TKZAWUHN2408 (2012-07-30) WiFi USB Dongle * *TKZAWUN2410 (2011-10-27) Wireless USB Dongle *TKZAWUHN2405 (2011-01-14) WiFi USB Dongle *TKZVIRTU901 (2010-02-11) Wireless AP Router *TKZAWUN2462D (2009-07-29) Wireless LAN USB Dongle *TKZAIB1105G (2008-12-29) 802.11b/g 500mW WiFi Booster *TKZAWBRG2415 (2008-01-23) WiFi Router *TKZAWBRG2405 (2007-06-05) WLAN Broadband Router *TKZAWUHG2403 (2007-05-17) Wireless LAN USB Dongle *TKZAWUG2407 (2007-03-08) Wireless LAN USB Dongle *TKZAWUHG2402 (2006-04-27) High Radio Power USB Adapter *TKZAWBRG2404 (2005-08-29) WLAN 11g Router -->
